Official taxis from Batam Centre to Telaga Punggur cost Rp. 65.000. On the reverse way, it's Rp. 60.000. You can try and bargain for a lower rate with taxis outside the port area. Passenger vans (known as
by the locals) run between Telaga Punggur and Jodoh / Nagoya. Catch it outside the port area.
